culture.title: Our Culture
culture.description: At Coreway Solution, we foster a culture of innovation, collaboration, and continuous learning. We believe in empowering our team members to reach their full potential.

values.title: Innovation First
values.description: We encourage creative thinking and experimenting with cutting-edge technologies to solve complex problems.

values.title: Collaborative Spirit
values.description: We work together as a team, sharing knowledge and supporting each other to achieve common goals.

values.title: Continuous Learning
values.description: We invest in our team's growth through training, conferences, and learning opportunities.

values.title: Work-Life Balance
values.description: We value personal time and offer flexible working arrangements to maintain a healthy work-life balance.

values.title: Diversity & Inclusion
values.description: We celebrate diversity and create an inclusive environment where everyone feels valued and respected.

values.title: Impact Driven
values.description: Every project we take on is an opportunity to make a meaningful impact for our clients and their users.

benefits.title: Benefits & Perks
benefits.description: We offer comprehensive benefits designed to support your health, happiness, and professional growth.

openPositions.title: Senior Full-Stack Developer
openPositions.description: We're looking for an experienced full-stack developer to lead complex projects and mentor junior team members.
responsibilities: Design and develop scalable web applications
Collaborate with product and design teams
requirements: Strong proficiency in React, Node.js, and TypeScript
Experience with cloud platforms (AWS, Azure, or GCP)
Knowledge of database design and optimization
niceToHave: Experience with Next.js and modern frontend frameworks
Knowledge of DevOps practices and CI/CD

openPositions.title: AI/ML Engineer
openPositions.description: Join our AI team to build intelligent solutions using machine learning and artificial intelligence technologies.
responsibilities: Develop and deploy machine learning models
Work with large datasets and data pipelines
Collaborate with data scientists and engineers
requirements: Experience with TensorFlow, PyTorch, or similar frameworks
Knowledge of NLP, computer vision, or recommendation systems
Understanding of MLOps and model deployment
niceToHave: PhD in Computer Science or related field

openPositions.title: DevOps Engineer
openPositions.description: Help us build and maintain robust infrastructure and deployment pipelines for our growing platform.
requirements: Strong knowledge of AWS, Azure, or GCP
Understanding of infrastructure as code (Terraform, CloudFormation)

openPositions.title: Product Designer
openPositions.description: Create beautiful, intuitive user experiences that delight our clients and their customers.
responsibilities: Conduct user research and usability testing
Collaborate with developers and product managers
requirements: Proficiency in Figma, Sketch, or Adobe XD
Understanding of design principles and best practices

openPositions.title: Technical Project Manager
openPositions.description: Lead technical projects from conception to delivery, ensuring quality, timeline, and client satisfaction.
responsibilities: Coordinate between technical teams and clients
Define project scope, timelines, and deliverables
requirements: 5+ years of technical project management experience
Strong understanding of software development lifecycle
niceToHave: Experience with project management tools (Jira, Asana)

openPositions.title: Junior Software Developer
openPositions.description: Start your career with us and learn from experienced developers while contributing to real-world projects.
requirements: Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or related field
Familiarity with web technologies (HTML, CSS, JavaScript)
niceToHave: Knowledge of React, Node.js, or Python
Contributions to personal or open-source projects
Understanding of Git and version control

hiringProcess.title: Our Hiring Process
hiringProcess.description: We've designed our hiring process to be transparent, efficient, and respectful of your time.

steps.title: Application Review
steps.description: We review your application and resume carefully. You'll hear back from us within 1 week.

steps.title: Initial Screening
steps.description: A brief phone or video call to discuss your background, interests, and the role.

steps.title: Technical Assessment
steps.description: Complete a take-home assignment or participate in a technical interview relevant to the role.

steps.title: Team Interview
steps.description: Meet with team members to discuss your experience, approach to work, and cultural fit.

steps.title: Final Interview
steps.description: Conversation with leadership about your career goals and how you'll contribute to our team.

steps.title: Offer & Onboarding
steps.description: Receive your offer and begin the onboarding process to join our team.
